title: Email Server Configuration Issue
description: Unable to send emails from our company domain. Getting SMTP authentication errors when trying to connect to the mail server.

title: Network Performance Optimization
description: Our office network has been running slowly, particularly during peak hours. Need assessment and optimization of current network infrastructure.

title: ERP System Integration
description: Need assistance integrating our new ERP system with existing inventory management software. Require API setup and data migration support.

title: Mobile App Bug Fixes
description: Several bugs reported in our Android application including login issues and push notification problems. Need urgent fixes for app store update.

title: Server Backup Configuration
description: Setting up automated daily backups for our main database server. Need configuration of backup schedules and disaster recovery procedures.

title: Website Security Audit
description: Requesting comprehensive security audit of our e-commerce website. Need vulnerability assessment and security enhancement recommendations.

title: Office WiFi Upgrade
description: Current WiFi infrastructure cannot handle increased number of devices. Need upgrade to support 200+ concurrent connections with better coverage.

title: Database Performance Tuning
description: Database queries running extremely slow affecting application performance. Need optimization of database indexes and query performance tuning.
